Touch someone: Take the posture of the Hamlet monologue

Puuduta kedagi: Vaata avatud suuga taeva poole ja hinga sügavalt
Touch someone: Look at the sky with your mouth open and take a deep breath
Shake the left, then the right leg

Puuduta kedagi: Puuduta parema käega vasaku jala varbaid
Touch someone: Touch the toes of the left foot with the right hand
Rub with one foot on the other

Puuduta kedagi: Tõsta käed nii kõrgele kui saad
Touch someone: Raise your hands as high as you can

Puuduta kedagi: Tõse püsti. Vaata paremale, vaata vasakule
Touch someone: Stand up. Look to the left, then look to the right

Puuduta kedagi: Pane käed selja taha ja hoia 30 sekundit
Touch someone: Put your hands behind your back and hold for 30 seconds
Draw your initials in the air with your elbows

Puuduta kedagi: Keera parem peopesa torusse ja aseta korraks kõrva juurde
Touch someone: Screw the right palm into the tube and place it briefly at the ear

Puuduta kedagi: Haara parema käega vasaku käe sõrmest
Touch someone: Grasp the finger of the left hand with the right hand
Touch the tip of the nose with the index finger of your right hand

Puuduta kedagi: Puuduta vasaku käega parema jala varbaid
Touch someone: Touch the toes of the right foot with the left hand
Assemble the palms for three seconds
Move the fingers of both hands
Simulate blinking your eyes with your hands
Put your legs and arms crossed

Puuduta kedagi: Puuduta vasaku käega parema jala varbaid
Touch someone: Touch the toes of the right foot with the left hand
Sniff the finger of the right hand
Touch the ground with your hands
Make eights with the fingers of the left hand
Make three circles with the head
Scratch nose with the left hand

Puuduta kedagi: Siruta parema käe väike sõrm ette
Touch someone: Extend the little finger of the right hand forward

Puuduta kedagi: Siruta end nii pikaks kui võimalik
Touch someone: Stretch yourself as long as you can

Puuduta kedagi: Tõsta korraks väikest sõrme, mitte liiga palju
Touch someone: Raise a small finger for a moment, not too much
Write your name in the air by hand
Gently blow wind to your fingers
Move slowly by dragging your feet
Rise to the toes three times
Step like a knight goes in chess

Puuduta kedagi: Väänle natuke aega nagu keedetud spagett
Touch someone: Turn back a bit like cooked spaghetti

Puuduta kedagi: Liigu vasak külg ees lähima ukseni
Touch someone: Move left side in front to the nearest door
Step three steps to the left

Puuduta kedagi: Käi korraks ukse juures ja puuduta linki
Touch someone: Walk to the door for a moment and tap the link

Puuduta kedagi: Liigu 2 sammu edasi, 3 sammu tagasi, 1 samm vasakule ja 4 sammu paremale, siis istu maha
Touch someone: Move 2 steps forward, 3 steps back, 1 step left and 4 steps right, then sit down
Walk the back in front 6 meters
Move the chair to another location

Puuduta kedagi: Tõsta tool õhku ja loe viieni
Touch someone: Raise the chair in the air and count to five
Tap two pieces of furniture at once
Adjust yourself to sit more comfortably in a chair
Move the chair to the right
Freeze in place and count to ten
Take a deep breath in and out three times
Put a chair to another place
Drag a chair to a wall
Pat friendly a piece of furniture
